name: Slukex
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with Riveric loanwords
staple diet: smoked fish and seaweed cakes
constraints: ritual magic requires scarce imported reagents
no instant resurrection; long-range mind-influence banned
navigational auguries don't replace charts or seamanship
notes: population unknown; transient crews and seasonal workers
access via narrow estuary; prone to silting and storm blockage
